The great selling point of Raffles is its beautiful colonial facade so I would recommend the outdoor bar downstairs in the courtyard instead of the upstairs Long Bar with beautiful white wrought iron detailing and make sure you check out the beautiful front entrance to the hotel as well
We had consumed 3 adults and 2 kids on the first morning4
Staff were amazing attentive friendly and efficient
For those who wish a total experience of excellence just visit Raffles

This is a tick off my bucket list and has left us with lasting memories
1: This was on my bucket list and was so worth it

Visited the Raffles Hotel to enjoy the original Singapore Sling and was not disappointed

There is no chance of a bad stay at Raffles we found it all good
